scripts.build: npm run build:ncc && npm run build:dist
scripts.build:ncc: npx ncc build source/Restore.ts --out product/ncc/restore && npx ncc build source/Store.ts --out product/ncc/store
scripts.build:dist: cp product/ncc/restore/index.js product/dist/Restore.js && cp product/ncc/store/index.js product/dist/Store.js
scripts.typecheck: tsc --build --force --noEmit # Build + force ensures that it's not cached and always runsâ€¦
